item.title: "Slightly Magic" Available for Pre-Order
item.description: The remake of “Slightly Magic” by Colin Jones is almost ready for release and can now be pre-ordered. Earlier this year Colin ran a sadly unsuccessful Kickstarter for it, so it’s great to see this will indeed see the light of day. The game features the original’s graphics and a remastered soundtrack by Allister Brimble.

item.title: Slightly Magic Kickstarter
item.description: Colin Jones is probably best known for his excellent rock star management simulation, “Rock Star Ate My Hamster”, which featured many thinly veiled (rather biting) pop culture references. “Slightly Magic” was a later creation of his which was always intended to be part of a trilogy of games, but sadly the latter two chapters were never released. Colin is now hoping to resurrect Slightly, starting with an updated version of “Slightly Magic” followed by two new games to complete the series.
